column2: "Iyinom nye ahyɛdze nye ntsɛmbu a hom ndwen do nyɛ wɔ asaase a EWURADZE
column3: w'egyanom Nyankopɔn dze ama wo dɛ fa no do
column4: nda a hom dze tse asaase do nyinara."

column2: "Ɔsɛɛ na hom nsɛɛ mbeambea nyinara a amanaman a hom rekɛfa no som hɔn enyame
column3: mbepɔw atsentsen do
column4: nye akoko do

column2: "na hom ndwuruw hɔn afɔrmbukyia
column3: na wombubu hɔn edum mu esinesin
column4: na wɔmfa gya nhyew hɔn Aserim; na hom ntwitwa hɔn enyame ehonyi a woesinsian no mu ngu
column5: na hom nsɛɛ hɔn dzin mfi bea no do."

column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ dɛm mma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."
"Mbom beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi wɔ hom ebusuakuw nyinara mu dɛ ɔdze ne dzin bɔto hɔ no
column3: mekyerɛ ne tsenabew no na hom nhwehwɛ
column4: na hɔ na hom kɔ;"

column2: "na hɔ na hom mfa hom ɔhyew afɔr
column3: nye hom okum afɔr
column4: nye hom ebupɛn du du nye hom nsamu ɔmado afɔr
column7: nye hom anantwikuw nye hom nguankuw mu mbakan nkɔ:"

column2: "na hɔ na hom ndzidzi wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim
column3: na hom nye hom efifo
column4: hom enyi ngye wɔ adze nyinara a hom dze hom nsa ka a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo wɔ mu no mu."

column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ndzɛmba a yɛreyɛ wɔ ha ndɛ da yi mu biara tse yi a nyimpa biara yɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ nankasa n'enyiwa do no:"
"na hom nnyae nndur ahomgye nye egyapadze a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no mu."
"Mbom sɛ hom nya twa Jordan
column3: na hom kɛtsena asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn rema hom enya edzi no do
column4: na ɔma hom ahomgye fi hom atamfo nyinara a woetwa hom ho ehyia ho

column2: "ɔno ɔbɛba dɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi ma ne dzin atsena hɔ no
column3: hɔ na hom mfa dza merehyɛ hom no nyinara nkɔ; hom ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye hom okum afɔr
column7: nye hom soronko anohobadze a hom bɔ ma EWURADZE no nyinara:"

column2: "na hom mma hom enyi ngye wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim
column3: hom
column4: nye hom mbabanyin
column8: nye Levinyi a ɔwɔ hom kuropon mu
column9: susuampa dɛ onnyi kyɛfa anaa egyapadze wɔ hom mu no."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ hom ho yie mma hom aammbɔ hom hyew afɔr wɔ beebiara a hom hu;"
"gyedɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi wɔ hom ebusuakuw kor mu
column3: hɔ na hom mbɔ hom hyew afɔr
column4: na hɔ na hom nyɛ dza merehyɛ hom nyinara."

column2: "Naaso ku na dzi nam wɔ wo kuropon nyinara mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wo kra no kɔn dɔ nyinara
column4: dɛ mbrɛ nhyira a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ehyira wo no tse: nyia no ho nntsew nye nyimpa no ho tsew ndzi bi

column2: "Bɔgya no nko na mma hom nndzi; hue gu famu dɛ nsu."
"Mma nndzi w'eburow
column3: anaa wo nsa
column4: anaa wo ngo mu ebupɛn du du wɔ wo kuropon mu
column5: anaa w'anantwikuw anaa wo nguankuw mu mbakan
column6: nye w'anohobadze biara a ebɔ ho anohoba

column2: "mbom dzi no wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no
column3: ɔwo
column4: nye wo babanyin
column8: nye Levinyi a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu: na ma w'enyi ngye wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ dza wo nsa ka nyinara ho."

column2: "Hwɛ woho yie amma aammpow Levinyi aber tsentsen nyina a edze tse w'asaase do nyinara mu."
"Sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn trɛw wo he mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ wo anohoba no
column4: na ese dɛ
column6: osiandɛ wo kra no kɔn dɔ dɛ obedzi nam a
column8: dɛ mbrɛ wo kra no kɔn dɔ nyinara."

column2: "Sɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi dze ne dzin ato hɔ no ɔnye wo ntamu twe dodow a
column3: ɔno ku w'anantwikuw nye wo nguankuw a EWURADZE dze ama wo no mu bi
column4: dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ wo no
column5: na dzi wɔ wo kuropon mu
column6: dɛ mbrɛ wo kra no kɔn dɔ nyinara."

column2: "Mekyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ wodzi adoa nye ɔtrɔm no
column3: dɛmara so na dzi bi: nyia no ho nntsew nye nyia no ho tsew nyina ndzi bi."

column2: "Nsew ara na hyɛ mma enndzi bɔgya no: na mma mmfa nam no nnka bɔgya no ho nndzi."
"Mma nndzi; hue gu famu dɛ nsu."
"Mma nndzi; ma onsi ɔwo
column3: nye wo mba a wodzi w'ekyir yie
column4: aber a ereyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do no."

column2: "Wo ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn a ewɔ no nko
column3: nye w'anohobadze
column4: na fa kɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi no:"

column2: "na bɔ wo hyew afɔr
column3: nam nye bɔgya no
column4: wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia no do: na wo kum afɔr bɔgyaa no wonhue ngu EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia no do

column2: "Dwen do tsie nsɛm a merehyɛ wo yi nyinara
column3: ma eesi ɔwo
column4: nye wo mba a wodzi w'ekyir yie daa
column5: aber a ereyɛ dza oye na ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyiwa do no."

column2: "Sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn twitwa amanaman fi w'enyim
column3: mbrɛ erokɔ akɛfa hɔn no
column4: na efa hɔn
column5: na etsena hɔn asaase do a;"

column2: "hwɛ woho yie amma wɔasɛɛ hɔn efi w'enyim n'ekyir no
column3: hɔn ekyirdzi aannyɛ wo efir; na eemmbisa hɔn enyame ekyir kwan
column4: dɛ
column5: Amanaman yi dua dɛn som hɔn enyame

column2: "Mma nnyɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dɛm: na EWURADZE n'ekyiwadze a okyir no nyinara na wɔayɛ ama hɔn enyame; na hɔn mbabanyin nye hɔn mbabaa mpo na wɔdze gya hyew hɔn ma hɔn enyame."
"Adze biara a merehyɛ hom no
column3: na hom ndwen do nyɛ: mma mmfa bi nnka ho
column4: na mma nnyi do bi so."
